category.name: Oil and Oil-free Compressors
category.path: Pneumatics\Oil and Oil-free Compressors

category_idosell.path: Pneumatics\Oil and Oil-free Compressors

description.name: Air oil compressor vertical 50L
description.long_desc:
A vertical oil compressor is an excellent choice for people who are looking for a reliable and efficient device for compressing air. Thanks to its vertical design, it takes up little space and is easy to use. A vertical oil compressor is characterized by high quality and durability. It is a modern and practical device that will meet your expectations and provide you with comfortable work.


Product characteristics:



  • Power supply voltage: 230V - this means that the compressor can be connected to a standard electrical socket.

  • Engine power: 2.5HP - this means that the compressor has a powerful engine that provides high air compression efficiency.

  • Rotation speed: 2800/min - this means that the compressor works at a high speed, which allows for quick filling of the tank with air.

  • Working pressure: 8BAR - this means that the compressor can achieve high air pressure, which is needed to power various pneumatic tools.

  • Tank capacity: 50L - this means that the compressor has a large air tank, which ensures a long working time without the need to restart the engine.


Product application:


A vertical oil compressor is a device that is used to compress air under pressure and power various pneumatic tools and machines. A vertical oil compressor is especially useful in workshops, paint shops, vulcanization plants and on construction sites, where high power, efficiency and tank capacity are required.

description.name: PP cutting pliers 3-36mm
description.long_desc:
PP Pipe Cutters 3-36mm


Made from high-quality tempered steel. Designed for cutting plastic pipes such as: PEX, PP-R, PE-RT, PE, PB with a thickness range of 3 to 36 mm.


Technical Specifications:



  • Enables precise and straight cuts

  • Durable metal body

  • Diameter: 3-36mm

category.name: Tools for PEX, PERT Pipes
category.path: Tools for Plumbers\Tools for PEX, PERT Pipes

category_idosell.path: Tools for Plumbers\Tools for PEX, PERT Pipes

description.name: calibrator 16-20-26mm
description.long_desc:
"The Calibrator with Reamer is a tool that minimizes the risk of leaks during the installation of fittings on PEX pipes. By combining the capabilities of a calibrator and a reamer, it ensures a high level of tightness and prevents failures."

Technical Specifications:


  • Intended for: PEX pipes with diameters of 16 mm, 20 mm, and 26 mm

  • Color: Blue

category.name: Spirals for Unblocking Pipes
category.path: Tools for Plumbers\Spirals for Unblocking Pipes

category_idosell.path: Tools for Plumbers\Spirals for Unblocking Pipes

description.name: Drain cleaner 9mmx15m
description.long_desc:
Perfect for effective unclogging of sewage – snake sewer spring with dimensions of 9mm x 15m! Thanks to it, you will effectively deal with clogged drains and sewage, restoring a smooth flow of water.



  • Diameter of 9mm makes it ideal for various types of drains.

  • Length of 15m allows reaching hard-to-access places without the need to unfold the entire sewage system.

  • Solid construction ensures durability and effective operation.


The product will work perfectly in both household and professional applications.

description.name: Soldering iron gun- straight 100W
description.long_desc:
A straight resistance soldering iron with a power of 100W. Equipped with a base that allows you to place the soldering iron in a safe location when it's not in use.


Technical Specifications:

























Supply Voltage220-240V
Power100 W
Tip Diameter5, 6 mm
Tip MaterialBrass
Heating Time:3 - 5 minutes

category.name: Saws and Saws
category.path: Power Tools\Wood Processing\Saws and Saws

category_idosell.path: Power Tools\Wood Processing\Saws and Saws

description.name: Miter saw 1700W 210mm
description.long_desc:
Miter saw with feed is an indispensable tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value precision, convenience, and reliability in every project.


Powered by a 1700W electric motor, our miter saw provides the power and performance needed to tackle even the most demanding tasks. Equipped with a cutting blade with a diameter of 210mm, our equipment enables precise cutting of wood, plywood, panels, and other wood-like materials.


The rotating base allows for smooth adjustment of the angle within the range of -45°/0°/45°, ensuring that every cut is precise and repeatable. The miter saw also features an angle adjustment for the cutting blade within the range of 0°-45°.


To further facilitate work, the miter saw has been equipped with a laser guiding system and an LED-lit workspace area, ensuring that even the smallest details are visible and cutting precision reaches a whole new level.


The innovative feed system allows for smooth cuts up to 340mm in length. Additionally, depth of cut limiting and extendable workbench ensure full control and safety during operation. The maximum cutting depth at a 90° angle is 65mm, while setting the blade at a 45° angle allows for a depth of cut of 38mm.


Product Characteristics:




  • 1700W electric motor




  • 210mm cutting blade




  • Durable frame made of die-cast aluminum




  • Rotating base adjustable within the range of -45°/0°/45°: enables cutting at various angles, which is extremely useful for diverse projects.




  • Equipped with a precise laser guiding system.




  • LED-lit workspace area: Even in low light conditions, you will have full control over the cut.




  • Feed allowing for cutting up to 340mm in length when the base is set to 0° position; setting the base to 45° position allows for cutting up to 240mm.




  • Maximum cutting depth:




    • Blade set at a 90° angle: 65mm




    • Blade set at a 45° angle: 38mm






  • Equipped with a depth of cut limiter.




  • Extendable workbench: Convenient bench allows for working with various material sizes.




  • Includes a clamp for secure material holding.




  • Comes with two 210mm cutting blades, equipped with 24 and 60 carbide-tipped teeth.




  • Miter saw equipped with a dust extraction function.




Our miter saw complies with a number of standards and directives:




  • Directives: 2006/42/EC, 2014/30/EU, 2011/65/EU with consideration of changes introduced by Directive 2015/863/EU




  • Standards: EN IEC 55014-1:2021, EN IEC 55014-2:2021, EN IEC 61000-3-11:2019, EN IEC 61000-3-2:2019/A1:2021, EN 62841-1:2015, EN IEC 62841-3-9:2020/A11:2020




Technical Specifications:

























































































Motor
Input voltage230V / 50Hz
Power S11700W
Operating modeS6 25%* 2000W
No-load speed n04700 min-1
Blade dimensions
Tungsten carbide-tipped circular saw bladeO 210 x O 30 x 2,6mm
Number of teeth24 or 60
Maximum width of the saw blade tooth slot3 mm
Device rotation range-45° / 0° / +45°
Bevel cutting0° do 45° w lewo
Protection classII
Net weight11,8 kg
Laser
Laser classII
Wavelength650 nm
Laser power< 1mW
Noise data
A-weighted sound pressure level LpA96,5 dB(A)
Deviation KpA3 dB
Acoustic power level LWA109,5 dB(A)
Deviation KWA3 dB

Data regarding length and cutting depth:



































BevelMitreMaximum cutting widthMaximum cutting depth
0°0°340 mm65 mm
45L° / 45R°45°240 mm38 mm
45L° / 45R°0°240 mm65 mm
0°45°340 mm38 mm

description.name: Miter saw 2000W 255mm
description.long_desc:
A miter saw with feed is an indispensable tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value precision, convenience, and reliability in every project.


PPowered by a 2000W electric motor, our miter saw provides the power and performance needed to tackle even the most demanding tasks. Equipped with a cutting blade with a diameter of 255mm.


Our equipment enables precise cutting of wood, plywood, panels, and other wood-like materials. The rotating base allows for smooth adjustment of the angle within the range of -45°/0°/45°, ensuring that every cut is precise and repeatable. The miter saw also features an angle adjustment for the cutting blade within the range of 0°-45°.


To further facilitate work, the miter saw has been equipped with a laser guiding system and an LED-lit workspace area, ensuring that even the smallest details are visible and cutting precision reaches a whole new level.


The innovative feed system allows for smooth cuts up to 340mm in length. Additionally, depth of cut limiting and extendable workbench ensure full control and safety during operation.


The maximum cutting depth at a 90° angle is 90mm, while setting the blade at a 45° angle allows for a depth of cut of 45mm.


Product Characteristics:




  • 2000W electric motor




  • 255mm cutting blade




  • Durable frame made of die-cast aluminum




  • Rotating base adjustable within the range of -45°/0°/45°: enables cutting at various angles, which is extremely useful for diverse projects.




  • Equipped with a precise laser guiding system.




  • LED-lit workspace area: Even in low light conditions, you will have full control over the cut.




  • Feed allowing for cutting up to 340mm in length when the base is set to 0° position; setting the base to 45° position allows for cutting up to 240mm.




  • Maximum cutting depth:




    • Blade set at a 90° angle: 90mm




    • Blade set at a 45° angle: 45mm






  • Equipped with a depth of cut limiter.




  • Extendable workbench: Convenient bench allows for working with various material sizes.




  • Includes a clamp for secure material holding.




  • Comes with three cutting blades with a diameter of 255mm, equipped with 24, 60, and 100 tungsten carbide teeth.




  • Miter saw equipped with a dust extraction function.




Our miter saw complies with a number of standards and directives:




  • Directives: 2006/42/EC, 2014/30/EU, 2011/65/EU with consideration of changes introduced by Directive 2015/863/EU




  • Standards: EN IEC 55014-1:2021, EN IEC 55014-2:2021, EN IEC 61000-3-11:2019, EN IEC 61000-3-2:2019/A1:2021, EN 62841-1:2015, EN IEC 62841-3-9:2020/A11:2020

Input voltage230V / 50Hz
Power S12000W
No-load speed n04700 min-1

Tungsten carbide-tipped circular saw blade 255 x  30 x 2,8mm

Maximum width of the saw blade tooth slot3 mm
Device rotation range-45° / 0° / +45°

Number of teeth24, 60 or 100
Maximum width of the saw blade tooth slot3 mm
Device rotation range-45° / 0° / +45°
Bevel cutting0° do 45° w lewo
Protection classII
Net weight14 kg
Laser
Laser classII
Wavelength650 nm
Laser power< 1mW
Noise data
A-weighted sound pressure level LpA97,2 dB(A)
Deviation KpA3 dB
Acoustic power level LWA110,2 dB(A)
Deviation KWA3 dB

Data regarding length and cutting depth:



































BevelMitreMaximum cutting widthMaximum cutting depth
0°0°340 mm65 mm
45L° / 45R°45°240 mm38 mm
45L° / 45R°0°240 mm65 mm
0°45°340 mm38 mm
description.description:
A miter saw with feed is an indispensable tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value precision, convenience, and reliability in every project.


PPowered by a 2000W electric motor, our miter saw provides the power and performance needed to tackle even the most demanding tasks. Equipped with a cutting blade with a diameter of 255mm.


Our equipment enables precise cutting of wood, plywood, panels, and other wood-like materials. The rotating base allows for smooth adjustment of the angle within the range of -45°/0°/45°, ensuring that every cut is precise and repeatable. The miter saw also features an angle adjustment for the cutting blade within the range of 0°-45°.


To further facilitate work, the miter saw has been equipped with a laser guiding system and an LED-lit workspace area, ensuring that even the smallest details are visible and cutting precision reaches a whole new level.


The innovative feed system allows for smooth cuts up to 340mm in length. Additionally, depth of cut limiting and extendable workbench ensure full control and safety during operation.


The maximum cutting depth at a 90° angle is 90mm, while setting the blade at a 45° angle allows for a depth of cut of 45mm.


Product Characteristics:




  • 2000W electric motor




  • 255mm cutting blade




  • Durable frame made of die-cast aluminum




  • Rotating base adjustable within the range of -45°/0°/45°: enables cutting at various angles, which is extremely useful for diverse projects.




  • Equipped with a precise laser guiding system.




  • LED-lit workspace area: Even in low light conditions, you will have full control over the cut.




  • Feed allowing for cutting up to 340mm in length when the base is set to 0° position; setting the base to 45° position allows for cutting up to 240mm.




  • Maximum cutting depth:




    • Blade set at a 90° angle: 90mm




    • Blade set at a 45° angle: 45mm






  • Equipped with a depth of cut limiter.




  • Extendable workbench: Convenient bench allows for working with various material sizes.




  • Includes a clamp for secure material holding.




  • Comes with three cutting blades with a diameter of 255mm, equipped with 24, 60, and 100 tungsten carbide teeth.




  • Miter saw equipped with a dust extraction function.




Our miter saw complies with a number of standards and directives:




  • Directives: 2006/42/EC, 2014/30/EU, 2011/65/EU with consideration of changes introduced by Directive 2015/863/EU




  • Standards: EN IEC 55014-1:2021, EN IEC 55014-2:2021, EN IEC 61000-3-11:2019, EN IEC 61000-3-2:2019/A1:2021, EN 62841-1:2015, EN IEC 62841-3-9:2020/A11:2020




Technical Specifications:





















































































Motor
Input voltage230V / 50Hz
Power S12000W
No-load speed n04700 min-1
Blade dimensions
Tungsten carbide-tipped circular saw blade 255 x  30 x 2,8mm
Number of teeth24, 60 or 100
Maximum width of the saw blade tooth slot3 mm
Device rotation range-45° / 0° / +45°
Bevel cutting0° do 45° w lewo
Protection classII
Net weight14 kg
Laser
Laser classII
Wavelength650 nm
Laser power< 1mW
Noise data
A-weighted sound pressure level LpA97,2 dB(A)
Deviation KpA3 dB
Acoustic power level LWA110,2 dB(A)
Deviation KWA3 dB

description.name: 2pc coil spring compressor with protection McPherson
description.long_desc:
Spring compressor with McPherson safety will make it easy for you to replace the springs and shock absorbers in your car. It is a set of two compressors with a length of 260 mm, made of durable steel. The spring compressor has an ACME threaded rod, which has trapezoidal notches on the surface. It is used to connect machine and device elements that have rotational motion. The rod has a larger pitch and thread angle than a regular metric threaded rod, which ensures better strength and resistance to wear.


Product characteristics:



  • Length 260 mm

  • ACME threaded rod

  • 2 elements


The set is suitable for sheet metal workshops, mechanics and car services.

description.name: Armature bearing puller 4pcs
description.long_desc:
Set of two-arm bearing pullers, 4 pieces - the set includes various sizes of pullers, allowing for the removal of bearings with different diameters. The arms are equipped with additional screws ensuring more stable bearing removal.


High Strength Materials: Made of high-quality alloy steel, the pullers are resistant to heavy loads and ensure long-lasting performance even with intensive use.


Ease of Use: The simple design and intuitive operation enable quick and efficient removal of bearings without the need for specialized skills.


Technical specification:



  • Number of arms: 2

  • Set contents:

    • Two-arm bearing puller 2" (35x45mm)

    • Two-arm bearing puller 3" (38x65mm)

    • Two-arm bearing puller 4" (40x80mm)

    • Two-arm bearing puller 6" (55x90mm)

description.name: Rubber broom and squeegee with telescopic handle 78.5-140cm
description.long_desc:
Telescopic Rubber Broom with Water Squeegee


An antistatic broom, a worthy successor to the classic bristle brush. Efficiently collects debris, hair, and dust. The practical water squeegee is a valuable addition in case of liquid spills on the floor.


The brush performs exceptionally well in hair salons, dog grooming salons. Excellent for allergy sufferers.



  • Rubber bristles do not stir up dust and dirt into the air while sweeping, keeping the environment clean and safe,

  • Special "bristles" made of antistatic rubber,

  • Adjustable handle length: 78.5 cm - 140 cm,

  • The dustpan has rubber to facilitate the collection of debris,

  • The brush is very gentle and suitable for any surface,

  • Multi-functional - designed for sweeping, cleaning, and water collection indoors and outdoors.


Product Characteristics



  • Antistatic rubber "bristles"

  • The brush is also suitable for carpets or upholstery, efficiently collects dust and hair that tend to weave into the carpet's structure. This allows for an easy and quick way to refresh our furniture, carpet, or upholstery.

  • Telescopic handle length: 78.5 - 140 cm

  • Brush length: 33cm

  • Bristle length: 3cm

  • After each use of the brush, simply wash it under running water, let it dry, ensuring that no bacteria, dust, or dirt accumulate in the brush. The broom will be ready for reuse.

description.name: Rubber broom with a dustpan
description.long_desc:
Antistatic Rubber Broom with Dustpan - an indispensable tool for every home. Made from high-quality rubber, this broom is not only durable, but also antistatic, which means it effectively attracts dust and dirt, ensuring cleanliness at the highest level. Additionally, the included dustpan facilitates quick and convenient removal of collected waste. Ideal for use on various surfaces, from floors to furniture. The Antistatic Rubber Broom with Dustpan is a practical thing thanks to which cleaning has never been so easy!


Product Characteristics:



  • Broom made of high-quality rubber

  • Antistatic ensures effective attraction of dust and dirt

  • It has an ergonomic grip making cleaning easier

  • The broom is equipped with a dustpan that facilitates quick and convenient waste collection.

description.name: Nylon flap brush 120x100 P120
description.long_desc:
Szczotka nylonowa do satyniarki, przeznaczona do obróbki różnych powierzchni, w tym drewna, metalu, tworzyw sztucznych, czy kompozytów.

Szczotka posiada włosie wykonane z wytrzymałego nylonu, które jest relatywnie szorstkie i może skutecznie usuwać materiały z powierzchni. Włosie może być ukształtowane w różny sposób, by osiągnąć gradację P120, co oznacza większą grubość ziarna ściernego.

Zastosowanie: Szczotki nylonowe o gradacji P120 są używane w bardziej zaawansowanych zadaniach obróbki, gdzie konieczne jest usunięcie grubych warstw powłok, usuwanie rdzy lub przygotowanie powierzchni przed dalszymi obróbkami. Mogą być wykorzystywane na metalu, drewnie, betonie i innych materiałach.
description.short_desc:
Szczotka nylonowa do satyniarki, przeznaczona do obróbki różnych powierzchni, w tym drewna, metalu, tworzyw sztucznych, czy kompozytów.

Szczotka posiada włosie wykonane z wytrzymałego nylonu, które jest relatywnie szorstkie i może skutecznie usuwać materiały z powierzchni. Włosie może być ukształtowane w różny sposób, by osiągnąć gradację P120, co oznacza większą grubość ziarna ściernego.

Zastosowanie: Szczotki nylonowe o gradacji P120 są używane w bardziej zaawansowanych zadaniach obróbki, gdzie konieczne jest usunięcie grubych warstw powłok, usuwanie rdzy lub przygotowanie powierzchni przed dalszymi obróbkami. Mogą być wykorzystywane na metalu, drewnie, betonie i innych materiałach.

description.name: Nylon flap brush 120x100 P180
description.long_desc:
Szczotka nylonowa do satyniarki, przeznaczona do obróbki różnych powierzchni, w tym drewna, metalu, tworzyw sztucznych, czy kompozytów.

Szczotka posiada włosie wykonane z wytrzymałego i elastycznego nylonu, które jest docinane lub wyprofilowane w taki sposób, aby osiągnąć gradację P180. W przypadku tej gradacji włosie jest relatywnie szorstkie, co sprawia, że jest ona odpowiednia do usuwania znaczników, farby, lakieru lub innych powłok z powierzchni.

Zastosowanie: Szczotki nylonowe o gradacji P180 są często wykorzystywane do prac związanym z przygotowaniem powierzchni przed dalszymi obróbkami, takimi jak malowanie lub lakierowanie. Mogą być również używane do usuwania rdzy, kamienia i innych zabrudzeń z metalowych powierzchni.

description.name: Nylon flap brush 120x100 P240
description.long_desc:
Szczotka nylonowa do satyniarki, przeznaczona do obróbki różnych powierzchni, w tym drewna, metalu, tworzyw sztucznych, czy kompozytów.

Szczotka posiada włosie wykonane z nylonu o ziarnistości P240. Włosie to jest stosunkowo miękkie i delikatne, co sprawia, że narzędzie jest idealne do usuwania małych zadrapań, równego wygładzania powierzchni i przygotowywania jej do dalszych etapów obróbki.

Zastosowanie: Szczotki nylonowe o gradacji P240 są używane w zadaniach, które wymagają precyzji i delikatności, takich jak wykańczanie powierzchni przed malowaniem, lakierowaniem lub innymi rodzajami pokrycia. Mogą również być stosowane do polerowania drewna lub innych materiałów.

description.short_desc:
Flap Brush for Drum Sander 120x100 P80

description.name: 450pcs insulated sleeves kit
description.long_desc:
Set of Sleeves - Cable Ends - A comprehensive solution for your cable-related needs! This set contains 450 pieces of sleeves in various sizes and colors.


Set Elements:



  • Blue sleeves (2.5 x 8mm) - 250 pieces

  • Black sleeves (4.0 x 9mm) - 100 pieces

  • Yellow sleeves (6.0 x 12mm) - 50 pieces

  • Red sleeves (10.0 x 12mm) - 50 pieces


Set of Sleeves - Cable Ends is an essential element of every tool set. Whether you're a professional or a hobbyist, this set will provide you with the necessary tools to get the job done!


Product Application:



  • Seals the connection, protecting cables and wires from contaminants and moisture

  • Reduces the risk of cable interruption or tearing

  • Facilitates the application of multi-wire cables

  • Improves the resistance of multi-wire cables to vibrations

description.name: Hose clamp W1 9mm 50-70mm
description.long_desc:
Opaski ślimakowe wykonane ze stali ocynkowanej W1. Jest to najbardziej popularny rodzaj opasek zaciskowych. Opaski tego typu stosowane są do łączenia węży i przewodów, mogą być stosowana do węży o ciśnieniu nie przekraczającym 25 bar. Obsługiwane kluczem 6-kątnym, wkrętakiem krzyżakowym lub płaskim. Dedykowane do stosowanie w środowisku niekorozyjnym.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • wykonane ze stali ocynkowanej – W1
  • przeznaczone do łączenia węży i przewodów
  • obsługiwane przy pomocy klucza 6-kątnego, wkrętak krzyżakowego lub płaskiego
  • do stosowania w środowisku niekorozyjnym

Dane techniczne:

Kod produktu Ř - średnica Materiał wykonania A - szerokość taśmy[mm] B - grubość taśmy[mm] Ilość w opakowaniu
